item.title: EM029: July 2009
item.itunes:subtitle: Electronica Monthly: #29 (July 2009)
item.description:
It's back up to full tempo for the second half of the summer with an array of up-tempo but chilled tracks, finished off with a touch of monkey madness. Full tracklisting is as follows:-
00:10 - 03:44 City Rain - This I will remember Part 1 03:45 - 06:23 City Rain - Wow that was boring 06:23 - 12:49 Arthur Oskan vs Spiral into the Storm - New York City People 12:49 - 19:22 Federsen - Nature of mind (Sensual Physics Remix) 19:06 - 25:36 Arthur Oskan vs Spiral into the Storm - Sun Squall 25:21 - 29:19 Simian Mobile Disco - Tits and Acid
For information about the podcast, featured artists, or to purchase any of the featured songs, go to http://www.electronicamonthly.com
Please send any demos to demos@electronicamonthly.com Any questions/feedback to feedback@electronicamonthly.com

item.title: EM027: April 2009
item.itunes:subtitle: Electronica Monthly: #27 (April 2009)
item.description:
Just squeezing in for the end of the month, the April podcast is full of beats, treats and monkeys. What am I talking about? Simian Mobile Disco - that's what. Yes, we're featuring the monkeys of music, the audio apes themselves. We've also got some great tracks by Kaom, Benzene Vapours and Crystal Palace. Full tracklisting is as follows:-
00:10 - 05:51 Kaom - Eye Glass 05:20 - 09:54 Simian Mobile Disco - Sleep Deprivation 09:34 - 15:38 Kaom - MDMA 15:23 - 19:02 Simian Mobile Disco - Hustler 18:46 - 22:14 Benzene Vapours - Send me your hang nails 22:15 - 29:20 Crystal Palace - Put your finger on it
For further information on any of the shows and featured artists, please go to http://www.electronicamonthly.com
Please send any demos to demos@electronicamonthly.com Any questions/feedback to feedback@electronicamonthly.com

item.title: EM026: Best of 2008
item.itunes:subtitle: Electronica Monthly: #26 (Best of 2008)
item.description:
A very happy new year to all of our listeners!! We've had so many great artists featured on the Electronica Monthly podcast in the last year, that it seemed only fitting to have a compilation of some of the best tracks from the last 12 months, so the tracklisting for the EM026 (Best of 2008) podcast is as follows:-
00:10 - 07:02 Abyssal Plains - Orange River 07:02 - 11:05 Esem - Microessen 11:05 - 14:48 Aquavit - Granular Sea 14:48 - 21:50 Yimino - Kelpy 21:50 - 27:40 Off The Sky - The Persistence of Visions
For further information on any of the shows and featured artists, please go to http://www.electronicamonthly.com
Please send any demos to demos@electronicamonthly.com Any questions/feedback to feedback@electronicamonthly.com

item.title: EM019: January 2008
item.itunes:subtitle: Electronica Monthly: #19 (January 2008)
